titleStmt.title: Articles of agreement & subscription between his highness Prince Rupert, and divers noble and honourable persons, and others, undertakers for working of mines royal, in the counties of Cardigan & Merioneth, in the principality of Wales.
titleStmt.author: Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for William Phillips at the Black Raven in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
